DOC.brief_title: Study Saxagliptin , 5-Hydroxy Saxagliptin , Metformin Concentrations/Levels Pediatric Subjects With T2DM
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose ass pharmacokinetics Saxagliptin , 5-hydroxy Saxagliptin , Metformin pediatric subject age 10 17 year T2DM follow oral administration Saxagliptin Metformin XR fix dose combination tablet co-administration Saxagliptin Glucophage® ( Metformin ) IR tablet
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis T2DM Male female subject age 1017 Body weight ≥50 kg Glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) 6.5 10 % Fasting plasma glucose ( FPG ) > 240 mg/dL screen Abnormal renal function Active liver disease and/or significant abnormal liver function
